layout.singingstanza: Let's o -- pen up our eyes, And see what God has done. To -- geth -- er let us all be -- hold God's great cre -- a -- tion! It's so vast! It's so grand! Each de -- tail by His al -- migh -- ty hand. Look a -- round, look and see All the things made for you and me!

lyrics.stanza: Let's open up our eyes, And see what God has done. Together let us all behold God's great creation! It's so vast! It's so grand! Each detail by His almighty hand. Look around, look and see All the things made for you and me!
